about_the_game:
Unlock a variety of heroes with unique passives, skills and playstyles through quests. Each hero offers different combat strategies, making gameplay dynamic and fun.


Face waves of relentless, dimension-hopping slimes in this thrilling action roguelike! Survive up to Wave 20 and confront elite, transformed slime bosses called "Yonians." Each biome presents unique challenges, difficulties, and boss choices, requiring different strategies. Customize your playstyle with powerful weapons, spells, and items.

Core Features:

Master five different weapon types, each offering unique gameplay:

  • Two-Handed Heavy Weapons: Slam shockwaves to damage all nearby foes.

  • Bow: Shoot precise shots or devastating volleys of arrows from afar.

  • Dual Swords: Execute rapid, thrusting attacks.

  • Sword & Shield: Slash enemies while defending when stationary.

  • Staff: Push enemies, deal area damage, and apply powerful buffs.

Harness a variety of powerful spells to enhance your combat strategies

  • Projectile Spells: Launch projectiles that directly target enemies.

  • Area Spells: Inflict damage over an area, either gradually over time or in powerful bursts.

Run: Hold 'Shift' to sprint, increasing speed, reducing damage, and boosting health regeneration—at the cost of disabling your weapon and resetting its cooldown.
Dash: Dodge attacks instantly while negating damage. Costs 10% of your current health, making it a lifesaver in critical moments.
Defend: When equipped with a shield, significantly reduce damage by standing still. Perfect for bracing against powerful attacks.


Missed picking up your gold? That sneaky Pirate Slime nabbed it with interest! Hunt him in the next wave to reclaim your treasure!


After each wave, head to the shop to buy, upgrade, sell, or replace your weapons, spells, passives, and items.


Collect power-ups during waves to boost your speed, increase damage, fast-forward the game, reduce cooldowns, and more.


Why You'll Love Slime Attack Survivor

  • Dynamic Combat: Customize your loadout with gear and spells.

  • Replayability: Experiment with different hero builds and strategies.

  • Challenging Boss Fights: Test your skills against powerful Yonians.

  • Visual Variety: Gear changes are reflected on your character.

  • Endless Fun: Conquer unique biomes and escalating challenges!

Are you ready to survive the slime onslaught? 🌟
